publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6684 Bruce Crawford on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Membership of the Congress of Local and Regional Authorities of Europe of the Council of Europeâ€”That the Parliament agrees to nominate, as a representative of the Parliament, Mr Frank McAveety MSP, as the alternate member on the UK delegation to the regional chamber of the Congress of Local and Regional Authorities of Europe of the Council of Europe.
